inferno 0.2.1

Package index

Main functions

buildmetadata()
Metadata and helper function for metadata
learn()
Monte Carlo computation of posterior probability distribution conditional on given data
Pr()
Calculate posterior probabilities
cumPr()
Calculate cumulative posterior probabilities
E()
Calculate posterior probabilities
mutualinfo()
Calculate mutual information between groups of joint variates
tplot()
Plot probabilities
plotquantiles()
Plot pairs of quantiles
plotFsamples()
Plot one-dimensional posterior probabilities

Internal functions

For developers.

alpha2hex2()
Various plotting and statistics functions
buildauxmetadata()
Build preliminary metadata flie
createQfunction()
Calculate and save transformation function for ordinal variates
inferno inferno-package
inferno: Bayesian nonparametric exchangeable inference - model-free uncertainty-quantified prediction
util_Pcheckpoints()
Calculate joint frequencies for checkpoints in learn()
util_lcumprob()
Calculate collection of log-probabilities for different components and samples
util_lprob()
Calculate collection of log-probabilities for different components and samples
vtransform()
Transforms variates to different representations
